title: Set Up Your Wallet
text: Once you've set up your wallet of choice, connect it to BULLSclub by clicking the wallet icon in the top right corner or by web3 signin. Learn about the wallets we support.

title: Creat Your NFTs
text: Click Create and Create your NFT. Add social links, a description, profile & banner images, and set a secondary sales fee.

title: Add Your NFTs
text: Upload your work (image, video, audio, or 3D art), add a title and description, and customize your NFTs with properties, stats, and unlockable content.

title: List Them For Sale
text: Choose between auctions or fixed-price listings. You choose how you want to sell your NFTs, and list for sale!
